data.description: Sync the container notes to notable event or SNOW ticket.

comment.comment: Not updating the notes back to Notable event of SNOW ticket as the tags are not set.
There are no notes to update notable event with.
There are no notes to update notable event with.

data.notes:
It looks for the below tags in container to execute a particular actions.

Update SIR ticket comment= if pending_sir_update is present in the container tags.

Update notable event comment= if pending_notable_update is present in the container tags.
